SpeechRecognitionEventInterpretation.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The interpretation read-only property of the
interface returns the semantic meaning of what the
user said.

remarks.para:
This might be determined, for instance, through the SISR specification of semantics in
a grammar (see
Semantic Interpretation for Speech Recognition (SISR) Version 1.0
for specification and examples.)

SpeechRecognitionEventInterpretation.value:
The returned value can be of any type. If no semantic interpretation has been returned
by the speech recognition system, null will be returned.
